member.name: IObjectWithFolderEnumMode.GetMode
member.summary: Retrieves the enumeration mode of the parsed item.
member.param: Pointer to a value that, when this method returns successfully, receives one of the values specifying the enumeration mode.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IObjectWithFolderEnumMode.SetMode
member.summary: Sets the enumeration mode of the parsed item.
member.param: One of the values that specify the enumeration mode.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IObjectWithFolderEnumMode
member.summary: Exposes methods that get and set enumeration modes of a parsed item.
